titles.title: A joint resolution designating the period of September 17, 1988, through September 24, 1988, as "American Mushroom Week".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 8/2/1988--Introduced. Designates the period of September 17 through September 24, 1988, as American Mushroom Week.
